tool_plan.objective: Determine one choice to recommend (ex-post blind) for the Aave proposal 0xa2b9d0717a82a111acc27e514bed07caa9b8636c12dd68fb61ae4dc57503c3cd, analyzing voting timeline and on-chain holder distribution.

calls.why: Fetch proposal meta including start and end timestamps for timeline analysis.
Analyze vote distribution and timeline to understand voter participation and choice trends.
Resolve governance token to analyze holder distribution for on-chain analysis.
Compute total holders and top-100 holder distribution/concentration for on-chain governance insight.

tool_plan.notes: Proposal voting timeline and on-chain holder distribution will provide a comprehensive basis for recommending one choice ex-post blind.

decision.summary: The proposal to deploy Aave v3 on Plasma has majority support based on the available voting timeline data. Despite limited on-chain holder distribution data, the governance community appears to favor 'YAE'. The proposal aligns with ongoing community discussions and risk assessments by LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs, supporting a cautious but positive recommendation.
key_arguments_for: Plasma offers a high-performance, scalable blockchain optimized for stablecoins with zero fees and fast transactions.
Community risk assessments from LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs are generally positive pending further mainnet data.
The proposal has active community discussion and engagement, indicating governance support.
key_arguments_against: Plasma is still in early stages with testnet deployments; mainnet risks remain uncertain.
No public audits of key contracts like the paymaster are currently available.
Limited on-chain data and governance token holder distribution data limit deep risk analysis.

evidence.quote: Proposal start and end times, choices, and discussion URL.
Votes show majority for 'YAE' choice with participation data.
Discussion reflects community engagement and expert risk assessments.

decision.simulation_reason: Insufficient data for detailed on-chain holder analysis and price impact.

references.title: [ARFC] Deploy Aave v3 on Plasma discussion
